Internal Gray Box Pen Testing

What is Internal Gray Box Pen Testing?

Internal gray box pen testing simulates what happens when an attacker has limited internal access: compromised credentials, insider threats, or malware that bypassed perimeter defenses. We test your network from the inside to find vulnerabilities real attackers would exploit.

Why It Matters

Most businesses focus on external threats. But once an attacker gets inside—through phishing, stolen credentials, or malware—they move fast. Gray box testing finds the holes in your internal defenses before attackers do.

What We Test

  • Network Segmentation: Can attackers jump from one system to another?
  • Privilege Escalation: Can limited access become admin access?
  • Lateral Movement: How far can an attacker spread inside your network?
  • Data Access: What sensitive data can insiders or compromised accounts reach?

The Capital Cyber Difference

We don't just run automated scans and hand you a report. We think like attackers. With 24 years of experience and 20,000+ passwords cracked in 2024, we know how hackers actually move inside networks. You get actionable fixes, not vague recommendations.
